name: Elf Quest (makeout creek)
description:
It's Christmas Eve, and Nelly the elf discovers that Santa's gone missing during his delivery run! she has to put together the B.E.S.T. team in the world to discover what happened and save Christmas.

This game was a short, 3-week project for Christmas 2018, for my family. Similar to those print-on-demand books where kids get to be the hero of the story, I wanted to make a game where my nieces and nephews could rescue Santa. Names have been changed for wider release, and my lips are sealed on whether anyone in my family can actually fly or is a seven-foot tall lizard man.

Asset Credits (besides the default RPGMaker ones):

Note: a large number of links for assets for this project no longer function, so I have lost citations for some of the art (Santa sprite and face, Nelly's faces, the Lizard Man faces particularly). If any of these are yours, please contact me for proper credit!

Santa with sleigh sprite - hiddenone (Part of the December 2014 RPG Maker ReStaff Bundle)

Christmas/Snowy tilesets - Pandamaru (Part of the December 2014 RPG Maker ReStaff Bundle)

Nelly Sprite - Chocolate Mint Tree - http://mintk.blog79.fc2.com/blog-entry-260.html

Assorted Elf Sprites - Tatanya - https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/tatanyas-sprites.32516/

Lizard Man sprite - Etoiler and Grandma Deb - https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/grannys-little-bits.27269/
